evidence.claim: Viz.ai uses AWS to power its solutions for healthcare.
The platform implements FHIR standards for interoperability in healthcare.
RESTful APIs are utilized for seamless integration with EHR systems.
HL7 standards are supported for healthcare data exchange with clearinghouses.
Event-driven architecture enables real-time data processing within the application.

icp.icp_reason: No specific evidence found of working with X12 transactions or clearinghouse functions.
